definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Scampish software and postern trojan, privately installs a lot of scampish software for the user.
sentences.chinese: 流氓軟件與後門木馬，私自爲用戶安裝很多流氓軟件。

sentences.english: Scampish software and postern trojan, privately installs a lot of scampish software for the user.
sentences.chinese: 流氓軟件與後門木馬，私自爲用戶安裝很多流氓軟件。
在284份郵件中就有1份包含着流氓軟件。

sentences.english: Apple has long boasted of the Mac's immunity to viruses and malware.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果電腦一直以它的免疫電腦病毒和流氓軟件而自傲。

sentences.english: Modernbrowsers also help protect against malware and phishing.
sentences.chinese: 現代瀏覽器也能幫助用戶防禦流氓軟件和網絡釣魚。

sentences.english: Above all we should understand what is scampish virus, scampish software.
sentences.chinese: 首先我們要明白什麼是流氓病毒，流氓軟件。
